value:
Laevatein always looks darling no
matter what outfit she wears. You'll
agree, I'm sure.

In Múspell, every new day brought
only more war. The idea of playing
in the ocean? A ridiculous fantasy.

In Múspell, the only sea is a sea of
flames. You could try swimming in it,
but you'd burn to ash in an instant.

Might I bother you to apply some
sunscreen to my back? There are
some spots I'm unable to reach...

I can't help but feel exposed without
my armor on...

I am Laegjarn of Múspell. I come
bearing greetings from your friend
$Nf...

I can't say I mind the beach in
summertime in the least.

Next to the fires of Múspell, the sun
here is nice and refreshing.

Perhaps this swimsuit is to blame for
such poor performance...

Thank you. It's like you knew exactly
what I wanted.

I am Laegjarn. I wore something
I thought would be fitting for the
season, but...I grow tired of it.

The beach in midsummer... It's like
a dream. I find myself losing track
of more time than I'd care to admit.$k$pMy duty is to fight. I mustn't lose
sight of that while indulging in the
pleasures of the summer season.$k$pAnd yet...spending time with you
here, in this weather, has been one
of the highlights of my life.$k$pWhatever destiny lies ahead, I will
always have these memories to return
to—even when times grow dark.$k$pThank you for that. I will repay you as
best I can on the battlefield. You can
count on it, $Nu.
やぁっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
水着が…！
I will show you how I swim.
In summer, the ocean!
Sink beneath the waves!
The sun! How it shines!
Laevatein, I'm sorry...
Yes?
I'd never even considered dressing like this. Do I put you in mind of Loki?
If you plan to go swimming, you should join me in some stretching exercises.
Compared to the scorching heat of Múspell, the midsummer sun is rather mild, I find. It's relaxing!
Ah, the sun is hot and yet the ocean is so cool. I feel refreshed.
I feel that I must make this clear. Don't even think about laying a hand upon my sister.
I wonder what Laevatein thinks about her swimming garb.
I trust you...to teach me how to swim.
Fine.
Swim training!
Mm, the sun!
